title: Should I bother playing ranked this season
body: 1st game out of placements and get an afk start to finish I think I mightn't do ranked this season if every game is gonna be like this.

replies.body: I think Ranked is too serious, i just stick to normals, aram, temporary gamemodes, and Customs. I find myself enjoying the game a lot c:

the serious game mode, where countless bas%%%%s intentionally troll and feed and afk and just dont give a damn, is TOO SERIOUS? are you for real? the mode is MEANT to be serious. the fact that people still see it as "just another mode" is %%%%ing sad. its like hearthstone, do you see people just surrendering games when ahead just to troll? no. but on LOL, people troll like that all the time...

> [{quoted}](name=SMBC,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=Enjg6vEw,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2015-01-25T21:11:59.352+0000)

> the serious game mode, where countless bas%%%%s intentionally troll and feed and afk and just dont give a damn, is TOO SERIOUS? are you for real? the mode is MEANT to be serious. the fact that people still see it as "just another mode" is %%%%ing sad. its like hearthstone, do you see people just surrendering games when ahead just to troll? no. but on LOL, people troll like that all the time...

I agree with what you said, trolls and their kind shouldn't exist at all. But even the smallest mistake will get you raged at. Even if you couldn't do anything about it, for example, your lane gets camped and you end up with a low score, you'll probably get flamed 10x more than you would in normals.

People don't surrender ahead just to troll... Sometimes they feel that the enemy should've won and surrender since they felt it was a good game, sometimes they just gtg, since in hearthstone a game is only a few minutes and you barely lose anything from a loss...

Its a game for fun. If you're not having fun don't play.

People obsessed with playing ranked when you can have more fun playing ARAMs sometimes.
